title: Dumb Phone
description:
Want to avoid easy distractions when you pick up your iPhone? 

Dumb Phone has your back by transforming it into a minimalist style phone to reduce phone addiction, swapping flashy icons / colors with a sleek and minimal Home Screen for accessing essential apps.

This removes the addictive dopamine from your phone which helps you think twice about why you just picked it up without realising, like we always do each day!
